page.title: 04Prestwood Schoolday Conc.
page.content:
Then I watchedthe "Philadelphia Experiment" and "Splash". Both of these were hired from our video club. After that I went upstairs and had a bath and then crawled into bed at 21.30, looking forward to Friday and Emma Cowley's disco. I eventually fell asleep, but woke up again from a nightmare about being kidnapped, and school going on until 21.00. I suppose I do sometimes like school, mostly when there is Games, and Swimming or Art. I like Maths and Decimals as that is what we have been doing these past few days.
- {Penny Robinson}
